title: Glitterball
brief_description: An alien spaceship crashlands on earth. It is piloted by the Glitterball, a small silver creature with amazing powers, and an appetite for human food. With the help of two small boys, Glitterball causes chaos and a lot of laughs, as it eats its way back to outer space. Rated: G
